name: js-chess-engine
description: The definitive response to 'Atari Chess beats ChatGPT' - A state-of-the-art chess platform with WebAssembly, NNUE, and agentic API.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:wasm" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:web && npm run build:mcp
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:wasm && npm run test:mcp
scripts.lint: eslint . && cd mcp-server && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix && cd mcp-server && npm run lint --fix
scripts.lint:check: eslint . --max-warnings 0 && cd mcp-server && npm run lint
scripts.format: prettier --write . && cd mcp-server && npm run format
scripts.format:check: prettier --check . && cd mcp-server && npm run format:check
scripts.quality:check: npm run format:check && npm run lint:check && npm run test
scripts.quality:fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.security-check: npm audit && cd mcp-server && npm audit
scripts.security-fix: npm audit fix && cd mcp-server && npm audit fix
scripts.security-fix-force: npm audit fix --force && cd mcp-server && npm audit fix --force
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mcp-server && npm install && cd ../wasm && cargo fetch
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules mcp-server/node_modules mcp-server/dist wasm/target wasm/pkg
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Jane Alesi <ja@satware.ai>
